MetaData.Name: RADx MARS
MetaData.OrgName: Datapult, an APHL company, in partnership with NIH NIBIB

Predicate.Description: If XTN.3 (Telecommunication Equipment Type) contains the value 'Internet' (Case Insensitive).
If XTN.3 (Telecommunication Equipment Type) contains the value 'Internet' (Case Insensitive).
If XTN.3 (Telecommunication Equipment Type) contains the value 'Internet' (Case Insensitive).
If XTN.7 (Local Number) is not valued
If XTN.4 (Email Address) is not valued
If XTN.4 (Email Address) is not valued
If XTN.3 (Telecommunication Equipment Type) contain the value 'Internet'.
If XTN.3 (Telecommunication Equipment Type) contain the value 'PH'.
If XTN.3 (Telecommunication Equipment Type) contain the value 'PH'.
If XAD.3 (City) contains the value 'Fake City'.
If XAD.3 (City) contains the value 'Fake City'.
If XAD.3 (City) contains the value 'Fake City'.
If ( CWE.1 (Identifier) is not valued AND CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is not valued )
If ( CWE.1 (Identifier) is not valued AND CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is not valued )
If ( CWE.1 (Identifier) is not valued AND CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is not valued )
If XON.1 (Organization Name) is not valued
If ( CWE.1 (Identifier) is not valued AND CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is not valued )
If XAD.1.1 (Street or Mailing Address) is valued
If XAD.1.1 (Street or Mailing Address) is valued
If XAD.1.1 (Street or Mailing Address) is valued
If The first occurrence of ORC-12.1 (ID Number) is valued
If OBX-29 (Observation Type) is not valued
If ( ( OBX-2 (Value Type) contain the value 'SN'. OR OBX-2 (Value Type) contain the value 'NM'. ) AND OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) does not contain the value 'X'. )
If OBX-29 (Observation Type) does not contain the value 'QST' (Case Sensitive).
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain one of the values in the list: ['35659-2','95419-8','65222-2'].
If OBX-29 (Observation Type) does not contain the value 'QST'.
If OBX-29 (Observation Type) does not contain the value 'QST' (Case Sensitive).
If PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-29 (Observation Type) does not contain the value 'QST' (Case Sensitive).

Constraint.Description: The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD]]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
SPM-18.1 (Time) shall match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
SPM-17.1.1 (Time) shall match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
If SPM-4.1 (Identifier) contains the value '119324002' (Case Insensitive). then SPM-4.2 (Text) shall contain the value 'Specimen of unknown material (specimen)' (Case Insensitive).
If SPM-4.1 (Identifier) contains the value '871810001' (Case Insensitive). then SPM-4.2 (Text) shall contain the value 'Mid-turbinate nasal swab (specimen)' (Case Insensitive).
If SPM-4.1 (Identifier) contains the value '697989009' (Case Insensitive). then SPM-4.2 (Text) shall contain the value 'Anterior nares swab (specimen)' (Case Insensitive).
ORC-1 (Order Control) shall contain the value 'RE'.
MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'NE'.
All occurrences of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value 'PHLabReport-NoAck'.
MSH-3.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO'.
All occurrences of MSH-21.2 (Namespace ID) shall contain the value 'ELR251R1_Rcvr_Prof'.
MSH-4.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'CLIA'.
All occurrences of MSH-21.3 (Universal ID) shall contain the value '2.16.840.1.113883.9.11'.
MSH-5.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO'.
All occurrences of MSH-21.4 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO'.
MSH-6.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO'.
MSH-7.1 (Time) shall match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) shall contain the value '|'.
MSH-9.1 (Message Code) shall contain the value 'ORU'.
MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) shall contain the value 'R01'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) shall contain the value '^~\&'.
MSH-9.3 (Message Structure) shall contain the value 'ORU_R01'.
MSH-3.2 (Universal ID) shall be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
MSH-11.1 (Processing ID) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['P','T'].
MSH-4.2 (Universal ID) shall match the regular expression '^\d{2}[D|Z]{1}\d{7}$'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) shall contain the value '2.5.1'.
MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'NE'.
If OBX-19.1 (Time) is valued then OBX-19.1 (Time) shall match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})?$'.
OBX-15.1 (Identifier) shall be identical to OBX-23.10 (Organization Identifier)

If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '65222-2'. then ( OBX-2 (Value Type) shall contain the value 'DT' (Case Sensitive). AND OBX-5 (Observation Value) shall match the regular expression '^(\d{8})$'. )
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) does not contain one of the values in the list: ['35659-2','65222-2']. then OBX-2 (Value Type) shall contain the value 'CWE'.

If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '35659-2'. then ( ( OBX-6.2 (Text) shall contain the value 'year' (Case Sensitive). AND OBX-6.1 (Identifier) shall contain the value 'a' (Case Sensitive). ) AND ( OBX-6.3 (Name of Coding System) shall contain the value 'UCUM' (Case Sensitive). AND OBX-6.7 (Coding System Version ID) shall contain the value '2.1' (Case Sensitive). ) )
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '35659-2'. then OBX-2 (Value Type) shall contain the value 'NM' (Case Sensitive).
OBX-15.1 (Identifier) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['00Z0000042','00Z0000043','00Z0000015','00Z0000016'] (Case Sensitive).
OBR-22.1 (Time) shall match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
OBR-7.1 (Time) shall match the regular expression '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
OBR-1 (Set ID - OBR) shall contain the value '1'.
OBR-4.1 (Identifier) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['97097-0','94558-4','95409-9','94559-2','95209-3','96986-5'] (Case Sensitive).
PID-1 (Set ID - PID) shall contain the value '1'.
If The first occurrence of PID-11.4 (State or Province) is valued then the first occurrence of PID-11.4 (State or Province) shall match the regular expression '^[A-Z]{2}$'.
All occurrences of PID-11.5 (Zip or Postal Code) shall match the regular expression '^\d{5}$|^\d{5}-\d{4}$'.
If The first occurrence of PID-10.1 (Identifier) is valued then the first occurrence of PID-10.3 (Name of Coding System) shall contain the value 'HL70005' (Case Sensitive).
If The first occurrence of PID-10.1 (Identifier) is valued then the first occurrence of PID-10.7 (Coding System Version ID) shall contain the value '2.5.1' (Case Sensitive).
All occurrences of PID-3.4.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO' (Case Sensitive).
All occurrences of PID-3.4.2 (Universal ID) shall be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.

If All occurrences of PID-13.3 (Telecommunication Equipment Type) is valued then all occurrences of PID-13.3 (Telecommunication Equipment Type) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['PH','Internet'] (Case Sensitive).
All occurrences of PID-3.5 (Identifier Type Code) shall contain the value 'PI' (Case Sensitive).
If The first occurrence of PID-5 (Patient Name) is not valued then the second occurrence of PID-5.7 (Name Type Code) shall contain the value 'S' (Case Sensitive).
PID-7.1 (Time) shall match the regular expression '^\d{8}$'.
If SFT-6.1 (Time) is valued then SFT-6.1 (Time) shall match the regular expression '^\d{8}$'.

If PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contains one of the values in the list: ['35659-2','95419-8','65222-2'] (Case Sensitive). then PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-29 (Observation Type) shall contain the value 'QST' (Case Sensitive).
PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-1 (Set ID - OBX) shall be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000042'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-12.3 (Given Name) shall contain the value 'SA.OTCSelfReport' (Case Sensitive).

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000042'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-21.1 (Organization Name) shall contain the value 'SA.OTCSelfReport' (Case Sensitive).
OBX-24 (Performing Organization Address) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurances of OBX-24 (Performing Organization Address) in the message.

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000016'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-12.3 (Given Name) shall contain the value 'SA.Proctor' (Case Sensitive).

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contains the value '00Z0000015' (Case Sensitive). then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-12.1 (ID Number) shall match the regular expression '^\d{10}$'.
1 occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.SPECIMEN.SPM-17.1.1 (Time) shall be identical to 1 occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-7.1 (Time)
Where OBX-29 is not valued, OBX-17 (Observation Method) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurrences of OBX-17 (Observation Method) where OBX-29 is not valued in the message.
OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurances of OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) in the message.
Where OBX-29 is not valued, OBX-19 (Date/Time of the Analysis) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurrences of OBX-19 (Date/Time of the Analysis) where OBX-29 is not valued in the message.
All occurrences of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-12.3 (Given Name) shall be identical to All occurrences of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-16.3 (Given Name)

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000043'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-21.1 (Organization Name) shall contain the value 'SA.OTCInstrument' (Case Sensitive).
OBX-23 (Performing Organization Name) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurances of OBX-23 (Performing Organization Name) in the message.
OBX-15 (Producer's Reference) SHOULD contain the same value as all other occurances of OBX-15 (Producer's Reference) in the message.

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000016'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-21.1 (Organization Name) shall contain the value 'SA.Proctor' (Case Sensitive).

If At least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-15.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00Z0000043'. then at least one occurrence of PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.ORC-12.3 (Given Name) shall contain the value 'SA.OTCInstrument' (Case Sensitive).
